mutants.code:
from re import sub

def redistribute_spaces_by_vowels(sentence: str) -> str:
    cleaned_sentence = sub('', '', sentence.lower())
    result = sub('(?<=.)([aeiou])', ' \\1', cleaned_sentence)
    return result

from re import sub

def redistribute_spaces_by_vowels(sentence: str) -> str:
    cleaned_sentence = sub('[^a-z0-9]', 'MUTATED', sentence.lower())
    result = sub('(?<=.)([aeiou])', ' \\1', cleaned_sentence)
    return result

from re import sub

def redistribute_spaces_by_vowels(sentence: str) -> str:
    cleaned_sentence = sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', sentence.lower())
    result = sub('', ' \\1', cleaned_sentence)
    return result

from re import sub

def redistribute_spaces_by_vowels(sentence: str) -> str:
    cleaned_sentence = sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', sentence.lower())
    result = sub('(?<=.)([aeiou])', '', cleaned_sentence)
    return result
